price: 37. Wayse beeniyeen, markaasaa waxaa qabtay dhul gariir daran (iyo qarax weyn), waxayna noqdeen kuwo (baqti) ah oo degaankooda daadsan.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
